GS41lilavatu:1938: Lil_265a/ %dvi-%dvi-%eka-bhū-parimitais kati saṃkhyakās @syus tāsām yutis ca gaṇaka āśu mama @pracakṣva/
GS41lilavatu:1939: Lil_265c/ ambhodhi-kumbhi-śara-bhūta-śarais tathā aṅkais ced aṅka-pāśam iti yukti-viśāradas @asi//
GS41lilavatu:1942: yāvat-sthāneṣu tulya-aṅkās iti atra %prathamam tāvat sthāna-%dvaye tulyau/
GS41lilavatu:1960: Lil_267a/ sthāna-%ṣaṭka-sthitais aṅkais anyonyam khena varjitais/
GS41lilavatu:1965: Lil_268a/ nis-%ekam aṅka-aikyam idam nis-%eka-sthāna-antam %eka-apacitam vibhaktam/
GS41lilavatu:1966: Lil_268c/ rūpa-ādibhis tad-nihatais samās @syus saṃkhyā-vibhedās niyate aṅka-yoge//
GS41lilavatu:1967: Lil_269a/ %nava-anvita-sthānaka-saṃkhyakāyās ūne aṅka-yoge kathitam tu vedyam/
GS41lilavatu:1968: l 269c/ saṃkṣiptam uktam pṛthutā-bhayena na antas @asti yasmāt gaṇita-arṇavasya//
GS41lilavatu:1973: nis-%ekam 12 etat nis-%eka-sthāna-antam %eka-apacitam %eka-ādibhis ca bhaktam jātam 12_1/ 11_2/ 10_3/ 9_4/
GS41lilavatu:1975: Lil_271a/ na guṇas na haras na kṛtis na ghanas pṛṣṭas tathā api duṣṭānām/
GS41lilavatu:1976: Lil_271c/ garvita-gaṇaka-baṭūnām @syāt pātas avaśyam aṅka-pāśe asmin//
GS41lilavatu:1979: Lil_272a/ yeṣām su-jāti-guṇa-varga-vibhūṣita-aṅgī śuddhā akhila-vyavahṛtis khalu kaṇṭha-saktā/
GS41lilavatu:1980: Lil_272c/ līlāvatī iha sa-rasa-uktim udāharantī teṣām sadā eva sukha-saṃpad @upaiti vṛddhim//
GS41lilavatu:1981: Lil_272p/ iti śrī-bhāskara-ācārya-viracite siddhānta-śiromaṇau līlāvatī-saṃjñas pāṭī-adhyāyas saṃpūrṇas//
